Description: Wind and PV capacity is limited to the capacity installable on available areas according to legal status quo of 2017.
no restrictions on installable capacity due to available areas.
Minimum distance to settlements reduced to 500 m and wind installations in forests not allowed. No restrictions for PV installations.
Minimum distance to settlements of 1,000 m and wind installations in forests not allowed.
Minimum distance of wind energy converters to settlements reduced to 500 m and wind installations in forests allowed.
